description.raw:
* Adding subscribe options to ciface

* Fast publisher slow subscriber

* Revert

* Handle corrup log file

* Add sig handler to log playback

* Changelog

* Enable fast log playback

* Update command line optiosn

* Fix for discovery

* Working on a flood testing

* Fix missing messages

* Comment

* Fix tests

* Changelog

* Close branch fast_playback

* Added test

* Tweak

* Close branch ign-transport7-discovery-fix

* Close branch signhandler_log_playback

* Close branch ciface_sub_opts

* Close branch handle_corrupt_file

* Fix codecheck

* documentation

* Close branch flood_testing

* 7.2.0

* Added tag ignition-transport7_7.2.0 for changeset 9c0f2b09082b

* Fix ciface struct

* Changelog

* update transport7 changelog

* Close branch transport72_changelog

* Changelog.md edited online with Bitbucket

* Close branch fix_struct_ciface

* Added tag ignition-transport7_7.2.1 for changeset a70ec80c29f5
